summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Roxbury Street to West Barton Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; and declaring the proposed improvement necessary for the public health; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14216 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
